The Law of Diminishing Marginal Utility: "Every additional unit of a homogeneous good or service is worth less than the previous unit". Applies to cars, apples ...and money. As 2nd layer protocols (e.g. Lightning) improve Bitcoin's utility, demand for altcoins will likely drop.
